- Location: Front exterior window, first floor, viewed from interior.  
- Window type/material: White vinyl double-hung window; lower sash with aluminum insect screen; interior horizontal blinds.  
- Glass/conditions: Clear glass, no cracks or condensation visible.  
- Seals/trim: Weatherstripping appears intact; no obvious gaps at sash.  
- Sill/trim wear: Minor exterior paint wear along the sill/trim observed.  
- Notable: Security sticker (Westinghouse) on upper glass. No visible issues.
